Actuated Frame (Arm 1).name: Rana wspomagana (Ramie 1)
Actuated Frame (Arm 1).description: Specjalnie wykonany zestaw pancernych płyt z zamontowanymi siłownikami oraz systemami ruchowymi,które wspomagają działania robota. Zasady specjalne: Ataki wręcz wykonywane ramionami ze wspomaganą ramą zadają obrażenia zwiększone o +1@fos[DC] . Jeśli we wspomaganą ramę jest wyposażony silnik robota, może on w tej samej turze wykonać pomniejszą akcję ruchu i główną akcję biegu.

Armor Frame.name: Szkielet pancerza
Armor Frame.description:
Standardowa opancerzona rama zasilanego egzoszkieletu produkcji West Tek. Źródłem energii jest zamontowany na plecach reaktor mikrofuzyjny TX-28, do którego można podłączyć zwykły rdzeń fuzyjny (strona 94). Szkieletu PW nie da się modyfikować

  • Obsługa0:Wejście do środka pancerza lub wyjście z niego wymaga akcji głównej. Na zakończenie każdej sceny, podczas której PW był używany, jego rdzeń fuzyjny traci 1 ładunek. Jeśli wskutek tego liczba ładunków spadnie do 0, szkielet traci zasilanie. Komplikacje podczas testów Atletyki wykonywanych w pancerzu wspomaganym mogą (decyzją MG) oznaczać zużycie dodatkowych ładunków, ponieważ przy zwiększonym wysiłku pancerz pobiera znacznie więcej energii.
  • Twarde lądowanie:Kiedy nosisz pancerz wspomagany, nie odnosisz żadnych obrażeń przy skoku lub upadku z dowolnej wysokości. Co więcej, gdy zeskakujesz z wysokości wyższej niż pierwsze piętro, przy lądowaniu zadajesz 3 DC obrażeń każdej istocie, która znajduje się w twoim zasięgu bezpośrednim – nawet przy braku zasilania pancerza.
  • Zwiększona Siła:Kiedy nosisz pancerz wspomagany, używasz jego Siły (wartość 11) zamiast swojej (na przykład w testach umiejętności lub przy obliczaniu Udźwigu albo wartości obrażeń zadawanych w walce wręcz). Dodatkowo ciężar samego szkieletu i zamontowanych na nim płyt pancerza nie wlicza się do noszonego przez ciebie ciężaru ekwipunku. Tracisz te korzyści, gdy pancerz wspomagany nie ma zasilania.
  • Zamknięte środowisko:Dopóki pancerz pozostaje hermetycznie zamknięty, czyli ma elementy pancerza w każdej lokalizacji i żaden z nich nie jest uszkodzony, posiada własną atmosferę, która umożliwia oddychanie pod wodą, w oparach trującego gazu lub w innych, równie groźnych warunkach. Tracisz te korzyści, gdy pancerz wspomagany nie ma zasilania.
  • Wytrzymałość ablacyjna:Kiedy zostaniesz zaatakowany lub z innego powodu odniesiesz obrażenia, są one zmniejszane o Odporność pancerza w danej lokalizacji, a ich ewentualny nadmiar narusza strukturę danego elementu (jego Punkty Zdrowia). Jeśli element pancerza otrzyma trafienie krytyczne (5 lub więcej obrażeń w jednym ataku) lub jego PZ spadną do 0, zostajeuszkodzony..Taki element pancerza nie zapewnia już ochrony – ataki w tę lokalizację trafiają bezpośrednio w użytkownika i wtedy używa się jego Odporności oraz Punktów Zdrowia
  • Maszyna:Elementy pancerza nie odzyskują w naturalny sposób Punktów Zdrowia i nie można ich przywracać stimpakami lub za pomocą testów Medycyny. Trzeba je naprawić, tak samo jak w przypadku robotów (strona 34). Każdy Efekt, który wpływa na maszyny i roboty, oddziałuje tak samo na pancerz wspomagany.

Army Helmet.name: Hełm wojskowy
Army Helmet.description: Hełm wykonany z metalu, plastiku lub lekkich stopów ceramicznych. Chroni głowę żołnierza przed odłamkami. Od wewnątrz jest wyłożony miękką wyściółką, umożliwiającą pewniejsze osadzenie na głowie.

Brotherhood of Steel Fatigues.name: Mundur Bractwa Stali
Brotherhood of Steel Fatigues.description:
A set of basic, hard-wearing gear for Brotherhood of Steel personnel, consisting of a military sweater, pants, gloves, combat boots, and military webbing, and emblazoned with Brotherhood insignia denoting rank and role. The color of the uniform also denotes certain specializations: medics wear a version with a white sweater, while flight personnel wear navy blue.

Though not intended for use in combat, these fatigues are hardwearing and resilient enough to provide a little protection against hazards.

Brotherhood of Steel Hood.name: Czepiec Bractwa Stali
Brotherhood of Steel Hood.description: The matching headpiece for the Brotherhood of Steel uniform, this close-fitting hood was developed before the Great War for wearers of Power Armor. It is designed to plug into the helmet of a suit of Power Armor, providing a closer interface to the armor’s systems, as well as containing an earpiece and microphone for the armor’s internal radio.

Brotherhood of Steel Uniform.name: Uniform Bractwa Stali
Brotherhood of Steel Uniform.description: Originally designed as the underarmor bodysuit for the T-45 Power Armor system. The bodysuit’s surface is covered with an assortment of interface ports and connections to connect the wearer with the Power Armor frame, over it. The Brotherhood of Steel employ these as the base of their standard uniforms, ensuring that as many of their personnel as possible are ready to wear full armor. In battle, the uniform is normally worn under other armor if Power Armor is unavailable, while senior Brotherhood officers often wear a bomber jacket or armored battlecoat over their undersuit.

Brotherhood Scribe's Armor.name: Pancerz skryby Bractwa
Brotherhood Scribe's Armor.description: The Scribes of the Brotherhood of Steel are sometimes required to venture out into the field to make observations or perform research up-close. While only providing limited protection, this garb is sufficient to protect the wearer from danger long enough to allow them to withdraw and seek assistance from someone better equipped.

Brotherhood Scribe's Hat.name: Czapka skryby Bractwa
Brotherhood Scribe's Hat.description: This lightweight leather cap and goggles are provided as an accompaniment to the Brotherhood Scribe’s Armor, to protect the head from hazardous conditions.

Cage Armor.name: Pancerz klatkowy
Cage Armor.description: Heavy leather clothing, reinforced with rags, metal plates, chains, and bars. Like spike armor (p.128), the metalwork creates a rough cage of rebar around the head and torso, providing extra protection. Normally worn with a hood and helmet.

Casual Clothing.name: Odzież codzienna
Casual Clothing.description:
Simple, lightweight, and easy to move around in, pre-War casual clothing was intended for leisure and light activity.

Zasady specjalne: Wearing casual clothing allows you to re-roll a single d20 on one STR or AGI based skill test you make each scene, as the clothing is easy to move in.

Casual clothing can be reinforced with Ballistic Weave (see sidebar, p. 126)

Casual Hat.name: Zwykły kapelusz
Casual Hat.description:
A simple, lightweight hat, normally with a peak or brim to keep the sunlight out of the wearer’s eyes.

Zasady specjalne: A character wearing a casual hat ignores any difficulty increases caused by extremely bright light.

Combat Armor.name: Pancerz bojowy
Combat Armor.description:
Each piece of Combat armor other than helmets can accept two mods, one of which is a Material, the other of which is an Upgrade. Combat helmets may only accept a Material mod. For mods applied to Torso armor, double the weight and cost (this has already been done for Torso Only mods). All Combat Armor Material mods are installed with the Repair skill.

  • Combat Armor: Reinforced, Shadowed, Fiberglass, Polymer

Combat Chest Piece.description:

Dog Helmet.name: Psi hełm
Dog Helmet.description: Characters who have taken the Dogmeat perk (p.63) are accompanied by a trusted canine companion, and they’ll probably want to protect Man’s Best Friend from the dangers of the wasteland.

Drifter Outfit.name: Strój tułacza
Drifter Outfit.description: A leather trenchcoat, sturdy hide gloves and boots, a pair of jeans, and a shirt make for an outfit that’s hard wearing but comfortable for long periods of time, and warm enough on the open road to suit those who wander the wastelands.

Engineer's Armor.name: Pancerz inżyniera
Engineer's Armor.description: Worn by Brotherhood engineers and those who style themselves as similar, this outfit consists of a protective jacket, heavy canvas or leather gauntlets, and a vest and toolbelt covered in pouches. It provides protection against the hazards of using power tools in a workshop but isn’t really armor fit for the battlefield.

Factory Armor (Arm 1).name: Pancerz Fabryczny (Ramie 1)
Factory Armor (Arm 1).description: A standardized, factory-made set of armor plating designed to fit any Mister Handy model.

Factory Armor (Arm 2).name: Pancerz Fabryczny (Ramie 2)
Factory Armor (Arm 2).description: A standardized, factory-made set of armor plating designed to fit any Mister Handy model.

Factory Armor (Arm 3).name: Pancerz Fabryczny (Ramie 3)
Factory Armor (Arm 3).description: A standardized, factory-made set of armor plating designed to fit any Mister Handy model.

Factory Armor (Main Body).name: Pancerz Fabryczny (Korpus)
Factory Armor (Main Body).description: A standardized, factory-made set of armor plating designed to fit any Mister Handy model.

Factory Armor (Optics).name: Pancerz Fabryczny (Sensory)
Factory Armor (Optics).description: A standardized, factory-made set of armor plating designed to fit any Mister Handy model.

Factory Armor (Thruster).name: Pancerz Fabryczny (Silnik)
Factory Armor (Thruster).description: A standardized, factory-made set of armor plating designed to fit any Mister Handy model.

Factory Storage Armor (Main Body).name: Pancerz fabryczny ze schowkami (Korpus)
Factory Storage Armor (Main Body).description: A factory-made set of standard armor which also provides additional storage compartments to increase a robot’s carrying capacity.

Formal Clothing.name: Elegancki strój
Formal Clothing.description:
A nice suit, a pretty dress, or some other kind of fancy, tailored clothing. Designed to be more flattering than functional, formal clothing is helpful when you need to impress someone, and is often prized as a sign of status, presenting the appearance of someone who doesn’t need to worry about their own safety.

Zasady specjalne: Wearing formal clothing allows you to re-roll a single d20 on one CHA-based skill test you make each scene, as the clothing helps you make a good first impression.

Formal clothing can be reinforced with Ballistic Weave (see sidebar, p. 126).

Formal Hat.name: Elegancki kapelusz
Formal Hat.description:
A smart-looking hat, that’ll look the part adorning your head during a business engagement or formal event. Or just because you like how it looks and it keeps the sun off your face. Many examples are somewhat battered and worn from neglect and ill-use, but they’re still functional.

Zasady specjalne: Wearing a formal hat allows you to re-roll a single d20 on one CHA-based skill test you make each scene, as it helps you make a good first impression.

Formal hats can be reinforced with Ballistic Weave (see sidebar).

Gas Mask.name: Maska przeciwgazowa
Gas Mask.description:
A rubber and leather mask with a plastic visor, which fits with an air-tight seal over the face. The front of the mask contains a filter which cleanses the air of contaminants like dust and gas.

Zasady specjalne: the gas mask provides +3 Poison damage resistance against any airborne or gaseous poisons and prevents the wearer from being affected by any effects relating to gas or dust. Add +1 to the difficulty of all Speech tests while wearing a gas mask, as it muffles your speech.

Hard Hat.name: Kask budowlany
Hard Hat.description: A light metal or plastic hat intended to protect the head from bumps and collisions in a busy industrial workplace or construction site. Not really intended to protect from combat, but if you’re lacking a helmet, a hard had is better than nothing.

Harness.name: Uprząż
Harness.description: A worker’s safety harness repurposed to serve as a mount for pieces of armor. Common amongst raiders, who tend to wear the harness without a shirt underneath.

Hazmat Suit.name: Kombinezon ochronny
Hazmat Suit.description: A completely enclosed suit for handling hazardous materials. The materials a hazmat suit is made from don’t stand up well to violence; but wearing one of these renders you basically immune to radiation.

Heavy Coat.name: Gruby płaszcz
Heavy Coat.description:
A long, heavy-weight coat—a leather duster, a trenchcoat, or similar—ideal for protecting you from the harsh elements. Provides a bit of protection against physical harm, extreme heat, and even covers well enough to keep a little radiation out.

Zasady specjalne: Wearing a heavy coat allows you to re-roll a single d20 on one END-based skill test you make each scene, as it helps protect you from harsh conditions.

A heavy coat can be reinforced with Ballistic Weave (see sidebar, p. 126).

Heavy Combat Armor.name: Ciężki pancerz bojowy
Heavy Combat Armor.description:
Each piece of Combat armor other than helmets can accept two mods, one of which is a Material, the other of which is an Upgrade. Combat helmets may only accept a Material mod. For mods applied to Torso armor, double the weight and cost (this has already been done for Torso Only mods). All Combat Armor Material mods are installed with the Repair skill.

  • Combat Armor: Reinforced, Shadowed, Fiberglass, Polymer

Heavy Dog Armor.name: Cięzki psi pancerz
Heavy Dog Armor.description: Characters who have taken the Dogmeat perk (p.63) are accompanied by a trusted canine companion, and they’ll probably want to protect Man’s Best Friend from the dangers of the wasteland.

Heavy Leather Armor.name: Ciężki pancerz skórzany
Heavy Leather Armor.description:
Made from tanned and treated animal hide, these hardened leather pieces provide modest protection from physical impacts and gunshots, as well as serving to insulate the wearer from fire and other dangerous energies.

Each piece of leather armor can accept two mods, one of which is a Material, the other of which is an Upgrade. For mods applied to Torso armor, double the weight and cost (this has already been done for Torso Only mods). All Leather Armor Material mods are installed with the Repair skill.

  • Leather Armor: Boiled Leather, Girded Leather, Treated Leather, Shadowed Leather, Studded Leather

Heavy Leather Chest Piece.name: Ciężki skórzany napierśnik

Heavy Metal Armor.name: Ciężki metalowy pancerz
Heavy Metal Armor.description:
Shaped metal plating held together—and held on— with leather or cloth straps, which provide decent protection from physical impacts such as melee attacks and gunshots, but less protection against energy attacks, as the metal plating conducts heat.

Each piece of Metal armor other than helmets can accept two mods, one of which is a Material, the other of which is an Upgrade. Metal helmets may only accept a Material mod. For mods applied to Torso armor, double the weight and cost (this has already been done for Torso Only mods). All Metal Armor Material mods are installed with the Repair skill.

  • Metal Armor: Painted Metal, Enameled Metal, Shadowed Metal, Alloyed Metal, Polished Metal

Heavy Metal Chest Piece.name: Ciężki metalowy napierśnik
Heavy Metal Chest Piece.description:
Shaped metal plating held together—and held on— with leather or cloth straps, which provide decent protection from physical impacts such as melee attacks and gunshots, but less protection against energy attacks, as the metal plating conducts heat.

Each piece of Metal armor other than helmets can accept two mods, one of which is a Material, the other of which is an Upgrade. Metal helmets may only accept a Material mod. For mods applied to Torso armor, double the weight and cost (this has already been done for Torso Only mods). All Metal Armor Material mods are installed with the Repair skill.

  • Metal Armor: Painted Metal, Enameled Metal, Shadowed Metal, Alloyed Metal, Polished Metal

Heavy Raider Armor.name: Ciężki bandycki pancerz
Heavy Raider Armor.description:
Makeshift armor employed by raiders and other cutthroat types across the wastes. It varies considerably in quality and appearance but tends to be made of scrap metal rudely battered into shape, reinforced by metal bars, wire, and leather straps. This barbaric appearance is often bolstered by grisly trophies such as skulls or other body parts.

Each piece of raider armor can accept two mods, one of which is a Material, the other of which is an Upgrade. For mods applied to Torso armor, double the weight and cost (this has already been done for Torso Only mods). Super mutant characters may only wear Raider armor. All Raider Armor Material mods are installed with the Repair skill.

  • Raider Armor: Welded, Tempered, Hardened, Buttressed

Heavy Synth Armor.name: Cięzki sytetyczny pancerz
Heavy Synth Armor.description:
Developed by The Institute, Synth armor is distinctive and provides excellent protection, especially from energy weapons, but can only really be found within the Commonwealth and other locations where Institute synths travel. The rarity of its manufacture means that it’s hard to acquire for anyone not on good terms with the Institute, and expensive even then.

Each piece of Synth armor other than helmets can accept two mods, one of which is a Material, the other of which is an Upgrade. Synth helmets may only accept a Material mod. For mods applied to Torso armor, double the weight and cost (this has already been done for Torso Only mods). All Synth Armor Material mods are installed with the Repair skill.

  • Synth Amor: Laminated, Resin, Microcarbon, Nanofilament

Hides.name: Skóry
Hides.description: Typically made from the rough hides of a brahmin, radstag, or other large animal, these simple clothes provide a little protection and comfort, but they’re no substitute for properly made clothing or armor.

Hood or Cowl.name: Kaptur
Hood or Cowl.description: A cloth or leather covering for the head and neck. Provides a little protection from the elements, and easily combined with a mask or kerchief to cover the mouth and nose to keep dust and fumes out. Handy in the wasteland if you’re caught outside without better protection.

Hydraulic Frame (Arm 1).name: Rama hydrauliczna (Ramie 1)
Hydraulic Frame (Arm 1).description:
A specially made set of armor plates which conceal powerful hydraulics which enhance the robot’s movements.

Zasady specjalneelee attacks made from arms fitted with a hydraulic frame inflict +1 @fos[DC] damage and gain the Stun damage effect.

Lab Coat.name: Kitel
Lab Coat.description:
A white coat—though likely stained or dirty— intended for use in a laboratory environment. Normally contains a useful number of pockets, and clock or sensor just below the left lapel, where it can be easily checked without having to reach for it—ideal during delicate scientific work.

Zasady specjalne: Between the utility of the design, and simply feeling smarter while wearing one, a lab coat allows you to re-roll a single d20 on one INT based skill test you make each scene.

A lab coat can be reinforced with Ballistic Weave (see sidebar, p. 126).

Leather Armor.name: Pancerz skórzany
Leather Armor.description:
Made from tanned and treated animal hide, these hardened leather pieces provide modest protection from physical impacts and gunshots, as well as serving to insulate the wearer from fire and other dangerous energies.

Each piece of leather armor can accept two mods, one of which is a Material, the other of which is an Upgrade. For mods applied to Torso armor, double the weight and cost (this has already been done for Torso Only mods). All Leather Armor Material mods are installed with the Repair skill.

  • Leather Armor: Boiled Leather, Girded Leather, Treated Leather, Shadowed Leather, Studded Leather

Light Dog Armor.name: Lekki psi pancerz
Light Dog Armor.description: Characters who have taken the Dogmeat perk (p.63) are accompanied by a trusted canine companion, and they’ll probably want to protect Man’s Best Friend from the dangers of the wasteland.

Military Fatigues.name: Mundur wojskowy
Military Fatigues.description:
A simple, hard-wearing shirt, jacket, pants, and set of combat boots designed to be worn by military personnel before the Great War. These garments are designed to be worn in unpleasant conditions, and have numerous pockets for carrying useful items, so an intact set is a decent find.

Zasady specjalne: Wearing military fatigues allows you to re-roll a single d20 on one STR or AGI based skill test you make each scene, as the fatigues are easy to move in.

Military fatigues can be reinforced with Ballistic Weave (see sidebar, p. 126)

Mister Gutsy Plating.name: Powłoka Pana Wyrwiflaka
Mister Gutsy Plating.description: Like the standard plating, but with better thermal absorption properties to reinforce it against energy weaponry, this is the standard plating for a Mister Gutsy. It is the default for all Mister Handy characters who select the Mister Gutsy starting package.

Noxious Plate (Arm 1).name: Trująca płyta (Ramie 1)
Noxious Plate (Arm 1).description:
Makeshift armor coated in toxic materials which are hazardous to the health of any who seeks to inflict harm upon the robot or its companions.

Zasady specjalne: When a melee attack is made against a location fitted with noxious plate, and the attacker suffers a complication, then the attacker suffers 2 @fos[DC] Persistent (Poison) damage. In addition, melee attacks made using arms fitted with serrated plate gain the Persistent (Poison) damage effect.

Noxious Plate (Arm 2).name: Trująca płyta (Ramie 2)

Raider Armor.name: Bandycki pancerz
Raider Armor.description:
Makeshift armor employed by raiders and other cutthroat types across the wastes. It varies considerably in quality and appearance but tends to be made of scrap metal rudely battered into shape, reinforced by metal bars, wire, and leather straps. This barbaric appearance is often bolstered by grisly trophies such as skulls or other body parts.

Each piece of raider armor can accept two mods, one of which is a Material, the other of which is an Upgrade. For mods applied to Torso armor, double the weight and cost (this has already been done for Torso Only mods). Super mutant characters may only wear Raider armor. All Raider Armor Material mods are installed with the Repair skill.

  • Raider Armor: Welded, Tempered, Hardened, Buttressed

Raider Chest Piece.name: Bandycki napierśnik
Raider Chest Piece.description:
Makeshift armor pieces made from scrap metal and salvaged Power Armor parts too damaged to undergo proper repair. Due to the improvised nature of its design, raider Power Armor is relatively weak compared to its fully functional counterparts.

Each piece of Raider Power Armor can accept two mods: an upgrade mod and a system mod. All Unique Raider Power Upgrade Mods are installed with the Repair Skill.

Raider Power Armor can make use of all the normal system mods (p.144) except for Tesla Arms, and may also use the following system mod which is installed with the Repair Skill:

  • Unique Raider Power Armor Upgrade Mods: Raider II
  • Unique Raider Power Armor System Mod: Welded Rebar

Road Leathers.name: Skóra motocyklowa
Road Leathers.description: A leather jacket, leather pants, and a set of motorcycle boots. Often decorated with metallic studs, these soft leather items provide modest protection against physical hazards such as an involuntary dismount from a motorbike, while still being reasonably comfortable in any temperate or cold climate.

Sack Hood.name: Kaptur workowy
Sack Hood.description: A tough fabric hood made from a burlap or canvas sack. Provides a little protection from dust and fumes and radiation by covering the whole head. Conveniently, it has eyeholes cut out, and some versions add in some form of makeshift breathing apparatus, though the effectiveness of these is dubious at best.

Serrated Plate (Arm 1).name: Ząbkowana płyta (Ramie 1)
Serrated Plate (Arm 1).description:
Makeshift armor plating with jagged, serrated edges. Like primal plate, but more hazardous to those who would do the robot ill, as the sharp protrusions can lead to injury.

Zasady specjalne: When a melee attack is made against a location fitted with serrated plate, and the attacker suffers a complication, then the attacker suffers 2 @fos[DC] Persistent (Physical) damage. In addition, melee attacks made using arms fitted with serrated plate gain the Persistent (Physical) damage effect.

Spike Armor.name: Pancerz z prętami
Spike Armor.description: Layers of leather, with rags, metal plates, lengths of chain, and bars sown into the layers or welded together. Many of the bars protrude outwards, creating a spiky appearance that helps fend off melee attacks, while the layers of metal plates and leather padding protect from hazards and attacks. A hood and helmet add to the protection provided.

Standard Plating.name: Standardowa powłoka
Standard Plating.description: The default factory plating provided with all brandnew Mister Handy models. This has no cost, as it’s the default which a Mister Handy character begins with most of the time.

Sturdy Combat Armor.description:
Each piece of Combat armor other than helmets can accept two mods, one of which is a Material, the other of which is an Upgrade. Combat helmets may only accept a Material mod. For mods applied to Torso armor, double the weight and cost (this has already been done for Torso Only mods). All Combat Armor Material mods are installed with the Repair skill.

Sturdy Leather Armor.description:
Made from tanned and treated animal hide, these hardened leather pieces provide modest protection from physical impacts and gunshots, as well as serving to insulate the wearer from fire and other dangerous energies.

Each piece of leather armor can accept two mods, one of which is a Material, the other of which is an Upgrade. For mods applied to Torso armor, double the weight and cost (this has already been done for Torso Only mods). All Leather Armor Material mods are installed with the Repair skill.

Sturdy Metal Armor.name: Solidny metalowy pancerz
Sturdy Metal Armor.description:
Shaped metal plating held together—and held on— with leather or cloth straps, which provide decent protection from physical impacts such as melee attacks and gunshots, but less protection against energy attacks, as the metal plating conducts heat.

Each piece of Metal armor other than helmets can accept two mods, one of which is a Material, the other of which is an Upgrade. Metal helmets may only accept a Material mod. For mods applied to Torso armor, double the weight and cost (this has already been done for Torso Only mods). All Metal Armor Material mods are installed with the Repair skill.

All Raider Armor Material mods are installed with the Repair skill.

  • Raider Armor: Welded, Tempered, Hardened, Buttressed

Sturdy Raider Right Arm.name: Solidny bandycki ochraniacz na prawą rękę
Sturdy Raider Right Arm.description:
Makeshift armor employed by raiders and other cutthroat types across the wastes. It varies considerably in quality and appearance but tends to be made of scrap metal rudely battered into shape, reinforced by metal bars, wire, and leather straps. This barbaric appearance is often bolstered by grisly trophies such as skulls or other body parts.

Each piece of raider armor can accept two mods, one of which is a Material, the other of which is an Upgrade. For mods applied to Torso armor, double the weight and cost (this has already been done for Torso Only mods). Super mutant characters may only wear Raider armor. Sturdy Synth Armor.name: Solidny syntetyczny pancerz
Sturdy Synth Armor.description:
Developed by The Institute, Synth armor is distinctive and provides excellent protection, especially from energy weapons, but can only really be found within the Commonwealth and other locations where Institute synths travel. The rarity of its manufacture means that it’s hard to acquire for anyone not on good terms with the Institute, and expensive even then.

Each piece of Synth armor other than helmets can accept two mods, one of which is a Material, the other of which is an Upgrade. Synth helmets may only accept a Material mod. For mods applied to Torso armor, double the weight and cost (this has already been done for Torso Only mods). All Synth Armor Material mods are installed with the Repair skill.

  • Synth Amor: Laminated, Resin, Microcarbon, Nanofilament

T-45 Chest Piece.name: T-45 napierśnik
T-45 Chest Piece.description:
Developed before the Great War, the T-45 was originally developed and manufactured for the United States Army by American defense contractor, West Tek. The T-45 Power Armor was the first version of Power Armor to be successfully deployed in battle, and as such, it remains relatively common more than 200 years later.

Each piece of T-45 Power Armor can accept three mods: an upgrade mod, one plating mod, and a system. All Unique T-45 Power Armor Upgrade Mods are installed with the Repair Skill.

  • Unique T-45 Power Armor Upgrade Mods: T-45b, T-45c, T-45d, T-45e, T-45f

T-51 Chest Piece.name: T-51 napierśnik
T-51 Chest Piece.description:
The T-51b was the most advanced Power Armor in wide-scale use before the outbreak of the Great War. First seeing service, and inherently, great success, in the Anchorage Reclamation campaign, the T-51 Power Armor soon became standard issue for the army’s armored infantry regiments. The T-51 was the peak of pre-War Power Armor technology, deployed widely enough that it can still be found centuries later in the wastelands.

Constructed of a polylaminate composite, the outer shell of T-51 armor is surprisingly lightweight and features an ablative silver alloy coating which refracts and dissipates laser emissions efficiently. Each piece of T-51 Power Armor can accept three mods: an upgrade mod, one plating mod, and a system. All Unique T-51 Power Armor Upgrade Mods are installed with the Repair Skill.

  • Unique T-51 Power Armor Upgrade Mods: T-51b, T-51c, T-51d, T-51e, T-51f

T-60 Chest Piece.name: T-60 napierśnik
T-60 Chest Piece.description:
Developed shortly after the U.S. Army’s victory in Anchorage, the T-60 series of Power Armor was designed as the next generation of armor to replace the T-51. It was in the process of being issued to U.S. Army units serving domestically when the bombs dropped, meaning that large quantities were still in storage awaiting deployment. As a result, stockpiles of the armor have been claimed by the Brotherhood of Steel, and Brotherhood soldiers in T-60 armor has become an iconic feature of their presence in a region.

Each piece of T-60 Power Armor can accept three mods: an upgrade mod, one plating mod, and a system. All Unique T-60 Power Armor Upgrade Mods are installed with the Repair Skill.

Unique T-60 Power Armor Upgrade Mods: T-60b, T-60c, T-60d, T-60e, T-60f

Tough Clothing.name: Wytrzymała odzież
Tough Clothing.description: Hard-wearing clothing cobbled together from sufficiently sturdy garments to create an outfit that can withstand a hard life in the wasteland. Normally made from a jacket, a shirt and undershirt, a pair of jeans, and some walking boots, reinforced (or patched) with duct tape, to provide both a little protection against the bumps and scrapes of life and a bit of warmth on those cold nuclear winter nights.

Toxic Plate (Arm 1).name: Toksyczna płyta (Ramie 1)
Toxic Plate (Arm 1).description:
Makeshift armor made with irradiated metal plating, dangerous to living creatures nearby.

Zasady specjalne: When a melee attack is made against a location fitted with toxic plate, and the attacker suffers a complication, then the attacker suffers 2 @fos[DC] Radiation damage. In addition, melee attacks made using arms fitted with serrated plate gain the Radioactive damage effect.

Toxic Plate (Arm 2).name: Toksyczna płyta (Ramie 2)
Toxic Plate (Arm 2).description:
Makeshift armor made with irradiated metal plating, dangerous to living creatures nearby.

Zasady specjalne: When a melee attack is made against a location fitted with toxic plate, and the attacker suffers a complication, then the attacker suffers 2 @fos[DC] Radiation damage. In addition, melee attacks made using arms fitted with serrated plate gain the Radioactive damage effect.

Utility Coveralls.name: Kombinezon roboczy
Utility Coveralls.description:
A versatile outfit favored by mechanics and other tinkerers; the coveralls are designed to protect both from hard, dirty work with machinery. Comes with heavy gloves to protect the hands, and a utility belt to hold a range of tools and other useful items.

Zasady specjalne: Utility Coveralls increase the wearer’s maximum carry weight by +5.

Vault Jumpsuit.name: Kombinezon mieszkańca krypty
Vault Jumpsuit.description:
Zapewniany przez Vault-Tec standardowy ubiór mieszkańców krypt. Obcisły, niebieski kombinezon z żółtym pasem wokół szyi i biegnącym w dół korpusu oraz ramion. Pas to metaliczna folia, która pomaga w wymianie ciepła i jest podłączona do wbudowanych w kombinezon czujników biometrycznych. Każdy kombinezon ma numer na plecach oznaczający kryptę, z której pochodzi.

Kombinezon może mieć dodatkowe ochronne pokrycie, czyli jedną z poniższych modyfikacji. Do jej instalacji wykorzystuje się umiejętność Naprawa..

  • Vault Jumpsuit: Ocieplane, Odporne, Osłaniane, Wyprawione

Vault-Tec Security Armor.name: Pancerz ochrony Vault-Tecu
Vault-Tec Security Armor.description: Składa się z długiego kuloodpornego kaftana z naramiennikmi oraz hełmu odpornego na uderzenia. Pancerz ten był wydawany w niewielkiej liczbie tym mieszkańcom krypt, którzy mieli pełnić funkcje strażników i ochrony. Zapewnia przyzwoitą obronę i nie jest zbyt ciężki, jednak nie sprawdza się w poważnej walce – głównie dlatego, że krypty miały być w pełni kontrolowanym środowiskiem, pozbawionym ciężkiej broni, która była dostępna na powierzchni.

Vault-Tec Security Armor (Complete).description: Składa się z długiego kuloodpornego kaftana z narmiennikami oraz hełmu odpornego na uderzenia. Voltaic Frame (Arm 1).name: Rama woltaiczna (Ramie 1)
Voltaic Frame (Arm 1).description:
Specjalnie wykonany zestaw pancernych płyt z zamontowanymi dodatkowymi przewodnikami i kondensatorami, które zwiększają skuteczność broni energetycznych.

Zasady specjalne:Jeśli robot jest wyposażony w przynajmniej jeden element ramy woltaicznej i zadaje atakiem obrażenia energetyczne, to zostają one zwiększone o +1@fos[DC]. Ten modyfikator wzrasta o kolejne +1@fos[DC] za każde dwie dodatkowe lokalizacje wyposażone w ramę woltaiczną (+2@fos[DC] przy 3 elementach, +3@fos[DC] przy 5 lub 6 elementach).

Welder's Visor.name: Maska spawalnicza
Welder's Visor.description: Wzmocniona czapka z metalową przyłbicą, w której osadzono szybkę z utwardzonego i przydymionego szkła. Chroni oczy użytkownika podczas używania sprzętu spawalniczego. W razie potrzeby jej przyłbicę można opuszczać i podnosić. Skrybowie oraz inżynierowie z Bractwa Stali często ją noszą, ponieważ spędzają dużo czasu w warsztatach, obrabiając i skuwając metal.

X-01 Chest Piece.name: X-01 napierśnik
X-01 Chest Piece.description:
Opracowany tuż przed nuklearną apokalipsą projekt X-01 znajdował się wciąż w fazie prototypu, gdy Wielka Wojna dobiegała końca. Pracę nad nim dokończyły ocalałe placówki badawcze amerykańskiej armii. X-01 zapewnia lepszą ochronę niż wcześniejsze modele, lecz z racji tego, że nigdy nie był produkowany na większą skalę, jest czymś wyjątkowo rzadkim.

Każdy element pancerza X-01 może mieć po trzy modyfikacje jedną systemu i powłoki oraz jedno ulepszenie.Do instalacji wszystkich ulepszeń wykorzystuje się umiejętność Naprawa.

Pancerz wspomagany X-01 może mieć zainstalowaną każdą z normalnie dostępnych modyfikacji systemu (strona 144) poza powłoką zimową. Może mieć także poniższy unikatowy mod, którego instalacja wykorzystuje umiejętność Naprawa.

  • Unikatowe ulepszenia pancerza X-01: Mk II, Mk III, Mk IV, Mk V, Mk VI
  • Unikatowe modyfikacje powłoki pancerza X-01:Osłona EM
